Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393534) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393534)
